alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:12AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Taylor County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1011 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Steinhatchee, moving northeast at 20 mph. At 1000 AM EDT, Keaton Beach measured a wind gust of 24 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fish Creek, Howell Place, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, Carbur and Cedar Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
